<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Load&#39;s results are &#123; Loaded value, Updated pointer, Chain &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a84e771c0f56c984d8ee4a85c0cb46ed3">ReplaceUses</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>(IntN, 0), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>(LoadN, 1));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StoreN;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagondagtodagisel/#a5ca4c7ea43e08e07577cb9024b1f769f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagondagtodagisel/#a5ca4c7ea43e08e07577cb9024b1f769f">HexagonDAGToDAGISel::tryLoadOfLoadIntrinsic</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadsdnode">LoadSDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The intrinsics for load circ/brev perform two operations:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 Load a value V from the specified location, using the addressing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    mode corresponding to the intrinsic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 Store V into a specified location. This location is typically a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    local, temporary object.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In many cases, the program using these intrinsics will immediately</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// load V again from the local object. In those cases, when certain</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conditions are met, the last load can be removed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function identifies and optimizes this pattern. If the pattern</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cannot be optimized, it returns nullptr, which will cause the load</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be selected separately from the intrinsic (which will be handled</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in SelectIntrinsicWChain).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Ch = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOperand(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOperand(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume that the load and the intrinsic are connected directly with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chain:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   t1: i32,ch = int.load ..., ..., ..., Loc, ...    // &lt;-- C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   t2: i32,ch = load t1:1, Loc, ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = Ch.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>-&gt;getOpcode() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110afc09e0bddd693dcf9923e4df42473bd9">ISD::INTRINSIC&#95;W&#95;CHAIN</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The second load can only be eliminated if its extension type matches</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that of the load instruction corresponding to the intrinsic. The user</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This transformation will leave the intrinsic dead. If it remains in</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;RemoveDeadNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Transform: (store ch val (add x (add (shl y c) e)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        to: (store ch val (add x (shl (add y d) c))),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where e = (shl d c) for some integer d.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The purpose of this is to enable generation of loads/stores with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shifted addressing mode, i.e. mem(x+y&lt;&lt;#c). For that, the shift</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value c must be 0, 1 or 2</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#acd1bcf7bcbb18b94234b2bf5a505e925">ReplaceNode</a>(T0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>(), NewShl.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Transform: (load ch (add x (and (srl y c) Mask)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        to: (load ch (add x (shl (srl y d) d-c)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask = 00..0 111..1 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          |     |     +-- d-c 0s, and d-c is 0, 1 or 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          |     +-------- 1s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          +-------------- at most c 0s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Motivating example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DAG combiner optimizes (add x (shl (srl y 5) 2))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     to (add x (and (srl y 3) 1FFFFFFC))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which results in a constant-extended and(##...,lsr). This transformation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// undoes this simplification for cases where the shl can be folded into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an addressing mode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HexagonDAGToDAGISel::ppAddrRewriteAndSrl(std::vector&lt;SDNode&#42;&gt; &amp;&amp;Nodes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SelectionDAG &amp;DAG = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SDNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> : Nodes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOpcode();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opc != ISD::LOAD &amp;&amp; Opc != ISD::STORE)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> Addr = Opc == ISD::LOAD ? <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOperand(1) : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOperand(2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Addr must match: (add x T0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Addr.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> T0 = Addr.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a977e54da724d62e7b08e2ad69723731e">getOperand</a>(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// T0 must match: (and T1 Mask)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (T0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ac513a7da1bf74fb3e3c594da8534f2d2">ISD::AND</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have an AND.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the first operand. It must be: (srl y c).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> S = T0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a977e54da724d62e7b08e2ad69723731e">getOperand</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (S.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a3c6553c8acebe1b57c211ee45e2d8f98">ISD::SRL</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ConstantSDNode &#42;SN = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ConstantSDNode&gt;</a>(S.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a977e54da724d62e7b08e2ad69723731e">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SN == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantsdnode/#a74b17cf9d0ee8268a5b38bbb896a30ba">getAPIntValue</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a512fe2c15ea651294688eeec1341644c">getBitWidth</a>() != 32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t CV = SN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantsdnode/#a5cb49674ec65724b4d9aecb48588a13a">getZExtValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the second operand: the supposed mask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ConstantSDNode &#42;MN = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ConstantSDNode&gt;</a>(T0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a977e54da724d62e7b08e2ad69723731e">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MN == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantsdnode/#a74b17cf9d0ee8268a5b38bbb896a30ba">getAPIntValue</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a512fe2c15ea651294688eeec1341644c">getBitWidth</a>() != 32)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Examine the mask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t TZ = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">llvm::countr&#95;zero</a>(Mask);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1267"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a58328e0582aabaf012bf9bc6f36c9e04">M1</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a239abca11deebf2731206dd41cf43c0e">llvm::countr&#95;one</a>(Mask &gt;&gt; TZ);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1268"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t LZ = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a66191f0bcc8c62b784819e9e96ceeba2">llvm::countl&#95;zero</a>(Mask);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1269"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Trailing zeros + middle ones + leading zeros must equal the width.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TZ + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a58328e0582aabaf012bf9bc6f36c9e04">M1</a> + LZ != 32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1271"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1272"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The number of trailing zeros will be encoded in the addressing mode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TZ &gt; 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1274"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The number of leading zeros must be at most c.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LZ &gt; CV)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1277"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1278"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All looks good.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1282"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SDLoc dl(S);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1354"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1355"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1356" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagondagtodagisel/#ad83627951b8c14a59773abf836d4e91a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagondagtodagisel/#ad83627951b8c14a59773abf836d4e91a">HexagonDAGToDAGISel::PreprocessISelDAG</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Repack all nodes before calling each preprocessing function,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because each of them can modify the set of nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> getNodes = &#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#93;() -&gt; std::vector&lt;SDNode &#42;&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;SDNode &#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>.reserve(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;allnodes&#95;size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;allnodes())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>.push&#95;back(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1367"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HST-&gt;useHVXOps())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PreprocessHvxISelDAG();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1369"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Transform: (or (select c x 0) z)  -&gt;  (select c (or x z) z)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            (or (select c 0 y) z)  -&gt;  (select c z (or y z))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ppSimplifyOrSelect0(getNodes());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Transform: (store ch val (add x (add (shl y c) e)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        to: (store ch val (add x (shl (add y d) c))),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where e = (shl d c) for some integer d.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The purpose of this is to enable generation of loads/stores with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shifted addressing mode, i.e. mem(x+y&lt;&lt;#c). For that, the shift</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value c must be 0, 1 or 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ppAddrReorderAddShl(getNodes());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Transform: (load ch (add x (and (srl y c) Mask)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        to: (load ch (add x (shl (srl y d) d-c)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask = 00..0 111..1 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          |     |     +-- d-c 0s, and d-c is 0, 1 or 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          |     +-------- 1s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          +-------------- at most c 0s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Motivating example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DAG combiner optimizes (add x (shl (srl y 5) 2))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     to (add x (and (srl y 3) 1FFFFFFC))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which results in a constant-extended and(##...,lsr). This transformation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// undoes this simplification for cases where the shl can be folded into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an addressing mode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ppAddrRewriteAndSrl(getNodes());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Transform: (op ... (zext i1 c) ...) -&gt; (select c (op ... 0 ...)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                                  (op ... 1 ...))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ppHoistZextI1(getNodes());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1585"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1586" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagondagtodagisel/#a96da5708e20bbbc59324f0985bd9df30"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagondagtodagisel/#a96da5708e20bbbc59324f0985bd9df30">HexagonDAGToDAGISel::DetectUseSxtw</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;R) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This (complex pattern) function is meant to detect a sign-extension</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// i32-&gt;i64 on a per-operand basis. This would allow writing single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1589"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// patterns that would cover a number of combinations of different ways</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1590"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a sign-extensions could be written. For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (mul (DetectUseSxtw x) (DetectUseSxtw y)) -&gt; (M2&#95;dpmpyss&#95;s0 x y)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// could match either one of these:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (mul (sext x) (sext&#95;inreg y))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (mul (sext-load &#42;p) (sext&#95;inreg y))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1595"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (mul (sext&#95;inreg x) (sext y))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The returned value will have type i64 and its low word will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contain the value being extended. The high bits are not specified.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The returned type is i64 because the original type of N was i64,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1601"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but the users of this function should only use the low-word of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// result, e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  (mul sxtw:x, sxtw:y) -&gt; (M2&#95;dpmpyss&#95;s0 (LoReg sxtw:x), (LoReg sxtw:y))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2098"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NOpcode == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2100"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CanFactorize = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  WeightedLeaf Mul1, Mul2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxPowerOf2 = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  WeightedLeaf GA;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not try to factor out a shift if there is already a shift at the tip of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the tree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HaveTopLevelShift = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TopLevel &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ((<a href="#aef5780c081044f78cc93135f94d56d6a">isOpcodeHandled</a>(Op0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>()) &amp;&amp; Op0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2112"><span class="doxyHighlight">       (<a href="#aef5780c081044f78cc93135f94d56d6a">isOpcodeHandled</a>(Op1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>()) &amp;&amp; Op1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2113"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        Op1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ac969b6c833cfa44c1b4fcd5790268340">getConstantOperandVal</a>(1) &lt; 4)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    HaveTopLevelShift = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Flatten the subtree into an ordered list of leaves; at the same time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// determine whether the tree is already balanced.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InsertionOrder = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SmallDenseMap&lt;SDValue, int&gt; NodeHeights;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imbalanced = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurrentWeight = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> Child = Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &amp;&amp; RootWeights.count(Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2126"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CASE 1: Child is a root note</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2127"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2128"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a> = RootWeights&#91;Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>()&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2129"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Weight == -1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2130"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Child = balanceSubTree(Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2131"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calculateWeight(Child.getNode());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2132"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a> = getWeight(Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2133"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Weight == -2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2134"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Whoops, this node was RAUWd by one of the balanceSubTree calls we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2135"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// made. Our worklist isn&#39;t up to date anymore.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2136"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Restart the whole process.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2137"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;--&gt; Subtree was RAUWd. Restarting...\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2138"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> balanceSubTree(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, TopLevel);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NodeHeights&#91;Child&#93; = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurrentWeight += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PowerOf2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2145"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TopLevel &amp;&amp; !CanFactorize &amp;&amp; !HaveTopLevelShift &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2146"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad8aec9273962cf78d087090c11a1dd1c">ISD::MUL</a> || Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2147"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a342c0d4e8e59b30daefe9a05bc2098bd">hasOneUse</a>() &amp;&amp; (PowerOf2 = <a href="#ab0240a68d7340353c85a26853b20b471">getPowerOf2Factor</a>(Child))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2148"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to identify two factorizable MUL/SHL children greedily. Leave</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2149"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// them out of the priority queue for now so we can deal with them</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2150"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// after.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2151"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Mul1.Value.getNode()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2152"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Mul1 = WeightedLeaf(Child, Weight, InsertionOrder++);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2153"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MaxPowerOf2 = PowerOf2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2154"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2155"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Mul2 = WeightedLeaf(Child, Weight, InsertionOrder++);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2156"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MaxPowerOf2 = std::min(MaxPowerOf2, PowerOf2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2158"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Our addressing modes can only shift by a maximum of 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2159"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxPowerOf2 &gt; 3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2160"><span class="doxyHighlight">            MaxPowerOf2 = 3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2162"><span class="doxyHighlight">          CanFactorize = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2163"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2164"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2165"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Leaves.push(WeightedLeaf(Child, Weight, InsertionOrder++));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#aef5780c081044f78cc93135f94d56d6a">isOpcodeHandled</a>(Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2167"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CASE 2: Child is an unhandled kind of node (e.g. constant)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2168"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a> = getWeight(Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2170"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NodeHeights&#91;Child&#93; = getHeight(Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2171"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurrentWeight += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2173"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#ae5642654641fb0ac7a884206ae74c967">isTargetConstant</a>(Child) &amp;&amp; !GA.Value.getNode())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2174"><span class="doxyHighlight">        GA = WeightedLeaf(Child, Weight, InsertionOrder++);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2175"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2176"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Leaves.push(WeightedLeaf(Child, Weight, InsertionOrder++));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2178"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CASE 3: Child is a subtree of same opcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2179"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Visit children first, then flatten.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2180"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ChildOpcode = Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2181"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ChildOpcode == NOpcode ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2182"><span class="doxyHighlight">             (NOpcode == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad8aec9273962cf78d087090c11a1dd1c">ISD::MUL</a> &amp;&amp; ChildOpcode == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2183"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2184"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Convert SHL to MUL</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2185"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> Op1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2186"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ChildOpcode == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2187"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Op1 = getMultiplierForSHL(Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2191"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NodeHeights.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a53408c95a7bfb5443b43fb2134c3eb23">count</a>(Op1) || !NodeHeights.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a53408c95a7bfb5443b43fb2134c3eb23">count</a>(Child-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a8388f666d6e735f35837ad03ed1f7a7a">getOperand</a>(0))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2192"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!NodeHeights.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a53408c95a7bfb5443b43fb2134c3eb23">count</a>(Child) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Parent visited before children?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2193"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Visit children first, then re-visit this node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2194"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Child);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Back at this node after visiting the children</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::abs(NodeHeights&#91;Op1&#93; - NodeHeights&#91;Child-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a8388f666d6e735f35837ad03ed1f7a7a">getOperand</a>(0)&#93;) &gt; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Imbalanced = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    WeightedLeaf <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">SHL</a> = Leaves.findSHL(31);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">SHL</a>.Value.getNode()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2281"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Height = std::max(NodeHeights&#91;GA.Value&#93;, NodeHeights&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">SHL</a>.Value&#93;) + 1;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TopLevel &amp;&amp; !CanFactorize &amp;&amp; Leaves.hasConst()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Leaves.pushToBottom(Leaves.pop());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Leaves.size() &gt; 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
